slide.title: Configuration
slide.example:
<?php
class eZTranslationCache {
	function cacheDirectory() {
		require_once 'lib/ezutils/classes/ezini.php';
		$ini =& eZINI::instance();
		$locale = $ini->variable( 'RegionalSettings', 'Locale' );
	}
}
?>
slide.blurb: That would make almost all components depend on *eZINI*, and that's something we want to avoid.
